page.title: 04LEISURE IN SIBLE HEDINGHAM
page.content: In the village we are lucky because we have lots of{leisure activities} such as{parks,library,clubs,public {houses, restaurants.}We also have {evening classes}at our comprehensive school and a{large village hall.} We have four{parks}or play areas. All of them have swings,some have see-saws and the larger one has all these plus roundabouts and a slide. There are many{clubs}in the village. Children's ones include Brownies, Guides,Cubs,Scouts,Gymnastics,Youth Club,Football and Rounders. The adult groups include{Evening Classes,}Bingo, Over Sixties,Luncheon Club,Wives Group,Womens Institute,Mothers Union, Theatrical Society,Snooker,Rounders and Football. There are six{public {houses}and one{restaurant.}
